sentences.en: A thick haze of acrid smoke hung in the air.
sentences.cn: 空气中弥漫着刺鼻的浓烟。

sentences.en: a thick oak door
sentences.cn: 一扇厚实的橡木门

sentences.en: a thick slice of homemade bread
sentences.cn: 一片厚厚的自制面包

sentences.en: Brown hopes to be back in the thick of the action as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 布朗希望尽快回去，参与到最紧要的行动中。

sentences.en: For a thicker gravy, add more flour.
sentences.cn: 想要肉汁浓一点，就再加些面粉。

sentences.en: He answered our questions in English but with a thick accent.
sentences.cn: 他用英语回答了我们的问题，不过口音很重。

sentences.en: He buttoned his collar tightly round his thick neck.
sentences.cn: 他把衣领的扣子扣上，紧紧地裹住了他的粗脖子。

sentences.en: he was borrowing the thick end of £750 every week.
sentences.cn: 每周的750镑他大部分是借来的。

sentences.en: He was thick-skinned enough to cope with her taunts.
sentences.cn: 他脸皮厚，不怕她嘲弄。

sentences.en: He was wearing thick glasses.
sentences.cn: 他戴着厚厚的眼镜。

sentences.en: His life was saved by a quarter-inch-thick bullet-proof steel screen.
sentences.cn: 多亏一块1/4英寸厚的防弹钢板，他才捡了条命。

sentences.en: If you want a thicker blanket, there are more here in the closet.
sentences.cn: 如果你想要更厚的毯子，这个柜子里还有。

sentences.en: In the winter she wears thick socks, Wellington boots and gloves.
sentences.cn: 冬天，她穿着厚袜子和橡胶雨靴，戴着手套。

sentences.en: My underskirt had ridden up into a thick band around my hips.
sentences.cn: 我的衬裙已经蹿到臀部，厚厚地卷成一圈。

sentences.en: peanut butter spread thick
sentences.cn: 抹得很厚的花生酱

sentences.en: She wore a thick tartan skirt and a red cashmere sweater.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一条厚厚的格子呢裙和一件红色羊绒衫。

sentences.en: short thick fingers
sentences.cn: 短粗的手指

sentences.en: Stew the apple and blackberries to make a thick pulp.
sentences.cn: 将苹果和黑莓炖成稠浆。

sentences.en: Teddy ran thick fingers through his unruly thatch of hair.
sentences.cn: 泰迪用自己的粗手指头捋了一下浓密蓬乱的头发。

sentences.en: The air is thick with acrid smoke from the fires.
sentences.cn: 空气中弥漫着火灾产生的刺鼻浓烟。

sentences.en: The meat is done when the thickest part turns from pink to white.
sentences.cn: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

sentences.en: The old Dutch fort with its thick high walls looks virtually impregnable.
sentences.cn: 古老的荷兰城堡城墙又厚又高，看起来几乎固若金汤。

sentences.en: The sauce is thick and rich so don't bother trying to diet.
sentences.cn: 这个酱汁又浓又香，别费劲节食了。

sentences.en: The tarnish lay thick on the inside of the ring.
sentences.cn: 戒指内侧有一层厚厚的锈斑。

sentences.en: They remained friends through thick and thin.
sentences.cn: 他们在任何情况下都是好朋友

sentences.en: they stuck together through thick and thin.
sentences.cn: 他们在任何困难的情况下都相互支持。

sentences.en: Thick chipboard across the window frames blocked out the daylight.
sentences.cn: 装在窗框上的厚厚的胶合板挡住了白天的光线。

sentences.en: thick wool socks (= socks that are heavy and warm )
sentences.cn: 厚厚的羊毛袜子

sentences.en: we were in the thick of the traffic.
sentences.cn: 我们处在交通最繁忙的时候。

words.tran_cn: 增厚；增稠剂，[食品] 芡粉；稠化
使变厚；变浓（thicken的现在分词）
变浓；变厚；变得模糊；变粗；变复杂
使变厚；使模糊；使…变复杂

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（两人或两人以上）亲密无间，非常友好
(英，非正式)太过分，令人受不了，不公平的，没有道理的

phrases.phrase: as thick as two (short) planks (或 as a plank)
give someone (或 get) a thick ear
phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)（被）揍…以作惩罚；（被）搧…耳光

phrases.phrase: in (或 into) the thick of something
phrases.tran_cn: 在…最激烈时，在…最紧张的时刻；处在…的深处
大量而急速地；频频地；快速地
不顾艰难险阻，在任何情况下；赴汤蹈火

trans.tran_cn: 浓的，茂密的，厚的，粗大的，稠密的，不透明的
trans.tran_en: if something is thick, there is a large distance or a larger distance than usual between its two opposite surfaces or sides

trans.tran_cn: 密集地，不清晰地，〈口〉太过分，频频地，时常
trans.tran_en: thickly. Many teachers think this is not correct English.

trans.tran_cn: 最拥挤部分；活动最多部分；事物的粗大浓密部分
